Hi, my name is

Vishesh

And i am a Full Stack Web Developer

_

Hey, I am Vishesh from New Delhi, India. I am 22 years old. I have completed my B.C.A (2017-2020) from Maharaja surajmal institute. I am a passionate Full Stack Web Developer.

I like to design, code up the front end look and logic of the website as much as i like to build the back end Restful API, algorithms and data storage solutions. Things i like to do apart from web development are watching and reading about technology, philosophy, economy and current affairs. Sometimes i also like to solve problems on competitive programming websites using JavaScript.

_

_

Brickviewstudios.com is the main website of Brickview Studios. This website is to help the organization and the Clients to communicate with each other in the initial stage.

I worked on the front-end part of this website. I was needed to improve the look and feel of the website.

_

I worked on Sarvogyan's both backend and frontend when I was working for Brickview Studios. Sarvogyan is an online course platform. The users can buy the subscription to access all the basic courses and can pay directly to access premium courses. Exams and E-books are also available.

Sarvogyan Frontend is built on React.js and backend on Node.js and Firebase. It's hosted on Firebase.

_

I worked on Edubrite when i was working for Brickview Studios. Edubrite is the website where users can come define their AR project needs and merchants can build and upload the 3D models for the user's AR project. Edubrite app is used to render the 3D models using AR.

The Frontend of the website is built on React.js and the backend is built using Node.js and AWS DynamoDB. It's hosted on AWS.

_

Vis blog is a website for anyone, who wants a simple and powerful blogging platform.The website is beginner-friendly but powerful enough to create, manage, and distribute informative blogs.

Vis blog front end is developed by using react.js and back end is written in node.js and MongoDB is used for storage.

_

Let's Donate targets to ease the interaction between the NGOs and users. It spreads the awareness about the upcoming NGO events among its users. It also helps the users to find the NGOs near their location by using the location of the user device.

Let's Donate front end is written in core technologies (HTML, CSS & javascript). And the server side is written in node.js. MongoDB is used for data storage.

_

Expensify is a small and very useful React.js web application. It helps the users to keep track of there expenses. It provides the interface to create, edit, remove there daily expenses.

Expensify front end is written in HTML, CSS and React.js. Firebase services are used for the Back end part. Firebase Database is used for the Data storage and firebase Auth is used to create and manage users account.
